summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5552 for the improvement of The Southeasterly 130 feet, more or less, of the Alley in Block 11, Heirs on Sarah A. Bell Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue and 7th Avenue, from Stewart Street to a connection with the existing pavement 130 feet, more or less, northwesterly of Stewart Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 71904, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
